Operation.Translation: // Between $$SourceMinimalCardinality$$ and $$SourceMaximalCardinality$$ instances of $$SourceName$$ can be connected to a single $$DestinationName$$

Logical.Expression: not('A') and not('B') and not('C') and not('L') and not('D') and 'E'
not('A') and not('B') and not('C') and not('L') and not('D') and not('E')
